TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Ru_ja_qas, title = Ru_ja_qas, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ru_ja_qas} }

S.FORM: alang Ru ja qas ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Taybu go (Dawu), kwara sali buwan nya ga 247 buwan, 588 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 62% kyan ku 362 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 38% kyan ku 226 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 56%, Amis 3%, Tayan 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Ru ja qas hya' ga Qu chn.la love vn. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Ru ja qas ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Ro ja qas ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Taybo go (Dawo), kwara sali bowan nya ga 247 bowan, 588 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 62% kyan ko 362 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 38% kyan ko 226 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 56%, Amis 3%, Tayan 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Ro ja qas hya' ga Qo chn.la love vn. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Ro ja qas ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
